__e: I am so stupid that no sane person should care about me.
Mario, do whatever you think is best and forget about me.
No, you have enough work to do without worrying about me and besides, I have a lot of work to do.
That way at least you will not have to worry about the search bar.
There is no need to worry about the security of your data.
The safety of the material is very important to us. So you don't have to worry about the certification.
Spend a holiday at sea without having to worry about anything is what everyone wants.
No, you have enough work to do without worrying about me and besides, I have a lot of work to do.
They may be nice and friendly like you were, but if they don't need you, they really can't be glad. They really can't care whether you're alive or not.
Always, in every society, when things begin to change, someone tries to grab everything he can. Everything he can, without concern for the needs and hopes of the people.
Well, I hope I'm never like that, pretending not to care.
